title: tripuraantakaa
sahitya:
tripurAntakA dEvA dInajanAvanA janAdi bhaya vimOcanA mAmava


anupallavi

 krpAsAgarA harA gaNAdIshvara upamanyu pUjita ugrAvatAra

caraNam
 
phaNi bhUSaNa nata bhakta tOSaNaA parama kalyANa guNA pApa shOSaNA
 maNivAcakanuta mAdhava sEvita mahanIya harikEsha mahAdEvEshA
